text: Live and Acoustic at Park Ave. is the second EP by alternative rock band Snow Patrol. It was released in 2005. All of the songs are played live and are taken from one performance. ==Track listing== #"Spitting Games" #"How to Be Dead" #"Grazed Knees" #"Chocolate" #"Run" Category:2005 albums
title: Live and Acoustic at Park Ave.
